divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was going to work I was on the highway heading south between laketon and Sherman blvd I caught this object in the corner of my eye I looked and seen this big orange object moving in and out of the cloud cover almost like it was peeking thru the clouds and then hiding back in them so I had to get this picture because I've never seen anything in the sky like this I took a picture and shortly after that it ducked bake into the clouds and I did not see it any more I am 100 % sure what I saw is not of this world!!!!
Summary: I was Driving to work going down the highway caught something in the corner of my eye looked and seen this orange object moving in and out of the cloud cover I pulled over and took a picture
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Muskegon
There were no other sightings in Muskegon on or around January 7th 2013
